notes: The BMW S85B50 engine is a 5.0 L V10 engine used in the E60 M5, produced from 2005 to 2010. It features a 90° configuration with an aluminum cylinder block and head, DOHC valvetrain with variable valve timing, and runs on petrol. The engine delivers a power output of 507 hp and a torque output of 520 N⋅m. There is no direct predecessor to this engine, and it was succeeded by the BMW S63.
